columns.description:
The status displayed is the highest of the suppliers qualifications 
that match the selected Organization and Commodity filters. For instance, if a 
supplier has an Approved status on one of their commodities and a Forbidden
status on another, the displayed status in this column will be Approved.

To display the list of qualifications in a tooltip, hover your mouse cursor over the status.
A checkmark indicates all required documents have been provided. An "X" indicates missing documents. Click on the icon to navigate to the details.
